## useSelectionHandler() function

Provides basic selection handling,

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useSelectionHandler<T>(equal: isEqual, singleSelect: boolean): [T[], ClickHandler<T>];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  equal | isEqual | A object equality function |
|  singleSelect | boolean | If it should operate in single select mode |

<b>Returns:</b>

\[T\[\], ClickHandler&lt;T&gt;\]

The list of selected objects and a handler for adding new selections
